    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        The appointment table view is loaded, along with the combo box options for users, contacts, and customers; utilizing two listening lambdas for the dateTimeFormatter for easy viewing, by setting the cell value. One lambda is for the selection toggle. The other lambda is for the start and end time combo boxes to be within the 8:00-22:00 EST office hours; while preventing the selection of time outside of office hours. Also, lambda added to the date pickers to contain associated dates for a fully functional date picker.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - The root objects relative path or null
        resourceBundle - The localized root resource bundle or null

      • checkAppointmentOverlap

        public boolean checkAppointmentOverlap​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> appointmentsList,
                                       Customers customerId,
                                       java.sql.Timestamp start,
                                       java.sql.Timestamp end)
        Checks for overlapping customer appointments.
        Parameters:
        appointmentsList - The appointment list to be compared against.
        customerId - The customer ID to be compared against the list.
        start - Start timestamp to be compared for overlapping appointments
        end - End timestamp to be compared for overlapping appointments
        Returns:
        true for a appointment overlap, or false

      • addAppointmentButton

        public void addAppointmentButton()
        Adds new appointment while checking for missing fields.

      • updateAppointmentButton

        public void updateAppointmentButton()
        Updates appointment while checking for missing fields. Lambda utilization occurs before inserting appointment ID until appointments are removed from the list, and then can pass the overlap method check.

      • editAppointmentButton

        public void editAppointmentButton()
        Allows editing of appointment while checking for missing fields.
